options: iyo bibaye ngombwa no ku mpera y'amabondo y'ikinyabiziga cyangwa  y'imitwaro ni itara ndangaburumbarare risa n'icunga rihishije cyangwa  ry'umuhondo
question: Iyo kuva bwije kugeza bukeye cyangwa bitewe n'uko ibintu bimeze bitagishoboka  kubona muri m 200, ibinyabiziga cyangwa imitwaro bifite ubugari burenga m 2.50 iyo  bigenda mu nzira nyabagendwa bigaragazwa ku buryo bukurikira:
iki cyapa gisobanura iki ?

options: igihe umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga kiri imbere ye amweretse ikimenyetso kimwemerera  kunyuranaho
question: Umuyobozi w'ikinyabizaga ashobora kunyuranaho:
Niki wakora mugihe usanze mu bimenyetso bimurika harimo ibara ry'umuhondo
Iyo kuyobya umuhanda ari ngombwa bigaragazwa kuva aho uhera no kuburebure  bwawo n'icyapa gifite ubuso bw'amabara akurikira:

options: itara ryera cyangwa ry'umuhondo cyangwa risa n'icunga rihishije riri kuri rumoruki  inyuma
itara ry'icyatsi cyangwa ry'umuhondo cyangwa risa n'icunga rihishije riri kuri  rumoruki inyuma
A na B ni ibisubizo by'ukuri
question: Iyo romoruki iziritse ku kinyamitende, velomoteri n'amapikipiki bidafite akanyabiziga  ko kuruhande uretse ikinyamitende na velomoteri bidafite umuyobozi, iyo  uburumbarare bwayo cyangwa bw'ibyo yikoreye bituma itara ry'ikinyabiziga gikurura  ritagaragara igihe bitagishoboka kubona neza muri m 200 bigomba kugaragazwa ku  buryo bukurikira:
Itara ndanganyuma rigomba gushyirwa aha hakurikira:
Ni gute bagenda muri uyu muhanda?
Nikihe cyapa cyerekena ko nta kinyabiziga gifite moteri cyemerewe kuhanyura?
Icyapa gikurikira kivuze iki?
Utugarurarumuri turi mu mbavu z'ikinyabiziga tugomba kugira ibara rikurikira:
Imodoka cyangwa ibinyabiziga bikomatanye bifite uburemere ntarengwa bwemewe  cyangwa uburemere bugendanwa burenga ibiro 12500 ntibwemerewe kurenza 50  km/h. Ni ikihe kinyabiziga bihuje iri tegeko?
Ibinyabiziga bifite ubugari bufite ibipimo bikurikira bigomba kugira amatara  ndangaburumbarare :

options: ibinyabiziga bifite umuvuduko nibura wa km 60 mu isaha
ibinyabiziga bishobora kurenza km 40 mu isaha
ibinyabiziga bishobora kurenza km 30 mu isaha
ibinyabiziga bishobora kurenza km 25 mu isaha
question: binyabiziga bikurikira bigomba kugira icyerekana umuvuduko kiri aho umuyobozi  areba neza kandi kigahora kitabwaho kugirango kigume gukora neza:

options: Iyo hari amategeko yihariye yerekanwa n'ibimenyetso
Iyo hatari amategeko yihariye yerekanwa n'ibimenyetso
question: Utuyira turi ku mpande z'umuhanda n' inkengero zigiye hejuru biharirwa  abanyamaguru mu bihe bikurikira:
Ahari hejuru cyane y'ubuso bumurika h'amatara ndangambere na ndanganyuma  ntihashobora kuba aharenze ibipimo bikurikira hejuru y'ubutaka iyo ikinyabiziga  kidapakiye:
Ku mateme, hagati y'ibinyabiziga bifite ibimenyetso byerekana umuvuduko hagomba  kuba intera ingana ute?
Icyapa cy'inyongera kerekana aho bagobokera ibinyabiziga kirangwa n'amabara  akurikira:

options: igihe umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga kiri imbere ye amweretse ikimenyetso kimwemerera  kunyuranaho
question: Umuyobozi w'ikinyabizaga ashobora kunyuranaho:

options: Akaba yera cyangwa asa n'umuhondo imbere
Aba ari umutuku cyangwa umuhondo inyuma
Ibiri haruguru byose ni ibisubizo by'ukuri
question: Amatara ndanga mbere n'aya ndanga nyuma y'imodoka zitarengeje metero 6  z'uburebure na metero ebyiri z'ubugari habariwemo imitwaro kandi ntakindi  kinyabiziga kiziritseho, ashobora gusimburwa n'amatara yo guhagarara umwanya  munini, iyo ibyo binyabiziga bihagaze umwanya muto cyangwa munini mu nsisiro  bibangikanye ku ruhande rw'umuhanda, ayo matara arangwa n'amabara akurikira
